refsect2.title: gnutls_certificate_set_openpgp_key ()
refsect2.para: This function sets a certificate/private key pair in the gnutls_certificate_credentials_t structure. This function may be called more than once (in case multiple keys/certificates exist for the server).
Note that this function requires that the preferred key ids have been set and be used. See gnutls_openpgp_crt_set_preferred_key_id(). Otherwise the master key will be used.

listitem.simpara: is a gnutls_certificate_credentials_t structure.
contains an openpgp public key
is an openpgp private key
On success, GNUTLS_E_SUCCESS (0) is returned, otherwise a negative error code is returned.

On success, GNUTLS_E_SUCCESS (0) is returned, otherwise a negative error value.
